14 DECLARE_bool(alsologtostderr);
15 DECLARE_bool(logtostderr);
16 DECLARE_int32(v);
17 
18 class SdfIntegratorsTest : public ::testing::TestWithParam<FloatingPoint> {
19  public:
20  SdfIntegratorsTest()
21  : depth_camera_resolution_(Eigen::Vector2i(320, 240)),
22  fov_h_rad_(2.61799), // 150 degrees
23  max_dist_(10.0),
24  min_dist_(0.5),
25  voxel_size_(0.10),
26  voxels_per_side_(16) {}
27 
28  virtual void SetUp() {
29  voxel_size_ = GetParam();
30 
31  // Create a test environment.
32  // It consists of a 10x10x7 m environment with an object in the middle.
33  Point min_bound(-5.0, -5.0, -1.0);
34  Point max_bound(5.0, 5.0, 6.0);
35  world_.setBounds(min_bound, max_bound);
36  Point cylinder_center(0.0, 0.0, 2.0);
37  FloatingPoint cylinder_radius = 2;
38  FloatingPoint cylinder_height = 4;
39  world_.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(new Cylinder(
40  cylinder_center, cylinder_radius, cylinder_height, Color::Red())));
41  world_.addGroundLevel(0.0);
42 
43  // Next, generate poses evenly spaced in a circle around the object.
44  FloatingPoint radius = 6.0;
45  FloatingPoint height = 2.0;
46  int num_poses = 50; // static_cast<int>(200 * voxel_size_);
47  poses_.reserve(num_poses);
48 
49  FloatingPoint max_angle = 2 * M_PI;
50 
51  FloatingPoint angle_increment = max_angle / num_poses;
52  for (FloatingPoint angle = 0.0; angle < max_angle;
53  angle += angle_increment) {
54  // Generate a transformation to look at the center pose.
55  Point position(radius * sin(angle), radius * cos(angle), height);
56  Point facing_direction = cylinder_center - position;
57 
58  FloatingPoint desired_yaw = 0.0;
59  if (std::abs(facing_direction.x()) > 1e-4 ||
60  std::abs(facing_direction.y()) > 1e-4) {
61  desired_yaw = atan2(facing_direction.y(), facing_direction.x());
62  }
63 
64  // Face the desired yaw and pitch forward a bit to get some of the floor.
65  Quaternion rotation =
66  Quaternion(Eigen::AngleAxis<FloatingPoint>(-0.1, Point::UnitY())) *
67  Eigen::AngleAxis<FloatingPoint>(desired_yaw, Point::UnitZ());
68 
69  poses_.emplace_back(Transformation(rotation, position));
70  }
71 
72  // Finally, get the GT.
73  tsdf_gt_.reset(new Layer<TsdfVoxel>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
74  esdf_gt_.reset(new Layer<EsdfVoxel>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
75 
76  truncation_distance_ = 4 * voxel_size_;
77  esdf_max_distance_ = 4.0f;
78 
79  LOG(INFO) << "Truncation distance: " << truncation_distance_
80  << " ESDF max distance: " << esdf_max_distance_;
81 
82  world_.generateSdfFromWorld(truncation_distance_, tsdf_gt_.get());
83  world_.generateSdfFromWorld(esdf_max_distance_, esdf_gt_.get());
84  }
85 
86  protected:
87  SimulationWorld world_;
88 
89  // Camera settings
90  Eigen::Vector2i depth_camera_resolution_;
91  FloatingPoint fov_h_rad_;
92  FloatingPoint max_dist_;
93  FloatingPoint min_dist_;
94  int num_viewpoints_;
95 
96  // Map settings
97  FloatingPoint voxel_size_;
98  int voxels_per_side_;
99  FloatingPoint truncation_distance_;
100  FloatingPoint esdf_max_distance_;
101 
102  // Generated viewpoints
103  AlignedVector<Transformation> poses_;
104 
105  // Maps (GT and generates from sensors) generated here.
106  std::unique_ptr<Layer<TsdfVoxel> > tsdf_gt_;
107  std::unique_ptr<Layer<EsdfVoxel> > esdf_gt_;
108 };
109 
110 TEST_P(SdfIntegratorsTest, TsdfIntegrators) {
111  TsdfIntegratorBase::Config config;
112  config.default_truncation_distance = truncation_distance_;
113  config.integrator_threads = 1;
114 
115  // Simple integrator
116  Layer<TsdfVoxel> simple_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
117  SimpleTsdfIntegrator simple_integrator(config, &simple_layer);
118 
119  // Merged integrator
120  Layer<TsdfVoxel> merged_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
121  MergedTsdfIntegrator merged_integrator(config, &merged_layer);
122 
123  // Fast integrator
124  Layer<TsdfVoxel> fast_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
125  FastTsdfIntegrator fast_integrator(config, &fast_layer);
126 
127  for (size_t i = 0; i < poses_.size(); i++) {
128  Pointcloud ptcloud, ptcloud_C;
129  Colors colors;
130 
131  world_.getPointcloudFromTransform(poses_[i], depth_camera_resolution_,
132  fov_h_rad_, max_dist_, &ptcloud, &colors);
133  transformPointcloud(poses_[i].inverse(), ptcloud, &ptcloud_C);
134  simple_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
135  merged_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
136  fast_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
137  }
138 
139  utils::VoxelEvaluationDetails simple_result, merged_result, fast_result;
140  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*tsdf_gt_, simple_layer,
141  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
142  &simple_result);
143  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*tsdf_gt_, merged_layer,
144  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
145  &merged_result);
146  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*tsdf_gt_, fast_layer,
147  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
148  &fast_result);
149  std::cout << "Simple Integrator: " << simple_result.toString();
150  std::cout << "Merged Integrator: " << merged_result.toString();
151  std::cout << "Fast Integrator: " << fast_result.toString();
152  std::cout << "Truncation distance: " << truncation_distance_ << std::endl;
153 
154  // Figure out some metrics to compare against, based on voxel size.
155  constexpr FloatingPoint kFloatingPointToleranceHigh = 1e-4;
156 
157  size_t total_voxels = simple_result.num_overlapping_voxels +
158  simple_result.num_non_overlapping_voxels;
159  size_t one_percent_of_voxels = static_cast<size_t>(total_voxels * 0.01);
160 
161  // Make sure they're all similar.
162  EXPECT_NEAR(simple_result.num_overlapping_voxels,
163  merged_result.num_overlapping_voxels, one_percent_of_voxels);
164  EXPECT_NEAR(simple_result.num_overlapping_voxels,
165  fast_result.num_overlapping_voxels, one_percent_of_voxels);
166 
167  // Make sure they're all reasonable.
168  EXPECT_NEAR(simple_result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
169  EXPECT_NEAR(merged_result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
170  EXPECT_NEAR(fast_result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
171 
172  EXPECT_LT(simple_result.max_error, truncation_distance_ * 2);
173  EXPECT_LT(merged_result.max_error, truncation_distance_ * 2);
174  EXPECT_LT(fast_result.max_error, truncation_distance_ * 2);
175 
176  EXPECT_LT(simple_result.rmse, voxel_size_ * 2);
177  EXPECT_LT(merged_result.rmse, voxel_size_ * 2);
178  EXPECT_LT(fast_result.rmse, voxel_size_ * 2);
179 
180  io::SaveLayer(merged_layer, "tsdf_fast_test.voxblox", true);
181 }
182 
183 TEST_P(SdfIntegratorsTest, EsdfIntegrators) {
184  // TSDF layer + integrator
185  TsdfIntegratorBase::Config config;
186  config.default_truncation_distance = truncation_distance_;
187  config.integrator_threads = 1;
188  Layer<TsdfVoxel> tsdf_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
189  MergedTsdfIntegrator tsdf_integrator(config, &tsdf_layer);
190 
191  // ESDF layers
192  Layer<EsdfVoxel> incremental_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
193  Layer<EsdfVoxel> batch_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
194  Layer<EsdfVoxel> batch_full_euclidean_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
195 
196  EsdfIntegrator::Config esdf_config;
197  esdf_config.max_distance_m = esdf_max_distance_;
198  esdf_config.default_distance_m = esdf_max_distance_;
199  esdf_config.min_distance_m = truncation_distance_ / 2.0;
200  esdf_config.min_diff_m = 0.0;
201  esdf_config.full_euclidean_distance = false;
202  esdf_config.add_occupied_crust = false;
203  esdf_config.multi_queue = true;
204  EsdfIntegrator incremental_integrator(esdf_config, &tsdf_layer,
205  &incremental_layer);
206  EsdfIntegrator batch_integrator(esdf_config, &tsdf_layer, &batch_layer);
207  esdf_config.full_euclidean_distance = true;
208  EsdfIntegrator batch_full_euclidean_integrator(esdf_config, &tsdf_layer,
209  &batch_full_euclidean_layer);
210 
211  for (size_t i = 0; i < poses_.size(); i++) {
212  Pointcloud ptcloud, ptcloud_C;
213  Colors colors;
214 
215  world_.getPointcloudFromTransform(poses_[i], depth_camera_resolution_,
216  fov_h_rad_, max_dist_, &ptcloud, &colors);
217  transformPointcloud(poses_[i].inverse(), ptcloud, &ptcloud_C);
218  tsdf_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
219 
220  // Update the incremental integrator.
221  constexpr bool clear_updated_flag = true;
222  incremental_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayer(clear_updated_flag);
223  }
224 
225  // Do batch updates.
226  batch_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayerBatch();
227  batch_full_euclidean_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayerBatch();
228 
229  utils::VoxelEvaluationDetails incremental_result, batch_result,
230  batch_full_euclidean_result;
231  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*esdf_gt_, incremental_layer,
232  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
233  &incremental_result);
234  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*esdf_gt_, batch_layer,
235  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
236  &batch_result);
237  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*esdf_gt_, batch_full_euclidean_layer,
238  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
239  &batch_full_euclidean_result);
240  std::cout << "Incremental Integrator: " << incremental_result.toString();
241  std::cout << "Batch Integrator: " << batch_result.toString();
242  std::cout << "Batch Full Euclidean Integrator: "
243  << batch_full_euclidean_result.toString();
244  std::cout << "Max distance: " << esdf_max_distance_ << std::endl;
245 
246  // Figure out some metrics to compare against, based on voxel size.
247  constexpr FloatingPoint kFloatingPointToleranceHigh = 1e-4;
248  constexpr FloatingPoint kKindaSimilar = 1e-2;
249  constexpr FloatingPoint kCloseEnough = 1.0;
250 
251  // Make sure they're all reasonable.
252  EXPECT_NEAR(incremental_result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
253  EXPECT_NEAR(batch_result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
254  EXPECT_NEAR(batch_full_euclidean_result.min_error, 0.0,
255  kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
256 
257  EXPECT_LT(incremental_result.max_error, esdf_max_distance_);
258  EXPECT_LT(batch_result.max_error, esdf_max_distance_);
259  EXPECT_LT(batch_full_euclidean_result.max_error, esdf_max_distance_);
260 
261  EXPECT_LT(incremental_result.rmse, esdf_max_distance_ * voxel_size_);
262  EXPECT_LT(batch_result.rmse, esdf_max_distance_ * voxel_size_);
263  EXPECT_LT(batch_full_euclidean_result.rmse, esdf_max_distance_ * voxel_size_);
264 
265  // Make sure they're all similar.
266  EXPECT_EQ(incremental_result.num_overlapping_voxels,
267  batch_result.num_overlapping_voxels);
268  EXPECT_EQ(incremental_result.num_overlapping_voxels,
269  batch_full_euclidean_result.num_overlapping_voxels);
270  EXPECT_NEAR(incremental_result.rmse, batch_result.rmse, kKindaSimilar);
271  EXPECT_NEAR(incremental_result.max_error, batch_result.max_error,
272  kCloseEnough);
273 
274  // Output for debugging.
275  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_euclidean_test.voxblox", true);
276  io::SaveLayer(batch_full_euclidean_layer, "esdf_euclidean_test.voxblox",
277  false);
278  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_batch_test.voxblox", true);
279  io::SaveLayer(batch_layer, "esdf_batch_test.voxblox", false);
280  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_incremental_test.voxblox", true);
281  io::SaveLayer(incremental_layer, "esdf_incremental_test.voxblox", false);
282  io::SaveLayer(*tsdf_gt_, "esdf_gt.voxblox", true);
283  io::SaveLayer(*esdf_gt_, "esdf_gt.voxblox", false);
284 }

294  FLAGS_v = 1;
295 
296  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
297

301

303 }
